results.title: The inflammatory bowel disease and gut microbiome are restored by employing metformin-loaded alginate-shelled microcapsules.
results.text_hl: In a @CHEMICAL_Dextran_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016264 @@@dextran sulfate sodium@@@-induced @DISEASE_Colitis @DISEASE_MESH:D003092 @@@colitis@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-loaded hydrogel microcapsules (MHM) significantly reduced disease activity, intestinal epithelial @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@damage@@@, and macrophage infiltration linked to pro-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokine factors.

results.title: Exploring the Protective Effects of Traditional Antidiabetic Medications and Novel Antihyperglycemic Agents in Diabetic Rodent Models.
results.text_hl: This review evaluates the protective effects of various antidiabetic treatments on organ tissues affected by @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@, based on findings from experimental animal models. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a first-line antidiabetic agent, has been widely recognized for its ability to reduce @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and oxidative stress, thereby mitigating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced organ @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Tartau CG, Boboc IKS, Mititelu-Tartau L, Bogdan M, Buca BR, Pavel LL, Amalinei C. Exploring the Protective Effects of Traditional Antidiabetic Medications and Novel Antihyperglycemic Agents in Diabetic Rodent Models. Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2025 May 1;18(5):. PMID: 40430489

results.title: Metformin and the ATM DNA damage response (DDR): Accelerating the onset of stress-induced senescence to boost protection against cancer
results.text_hl: By activating the @GENE_ATM @GENE_472 @@@ataxia telangiectasia mutated@@@ (@GENE_ATM @GENE_472 @@@ATM@@@)-mediated DNA @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@Damage@@@ Response (DDR), the @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ agonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might sensitize cells against further @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@damage@@@, thus mimicking the @DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@precancerous@@@ stimulus that induces an intrinsic barrier against @DISEASE_Carcinogenesis @DISEASE_MESH:D063646 @@@carcinogenesis@@@.

citations.NLM: Menendez JA, Cufí S, Oliveras-Ferraros C, Martin-Castillo B, Joven J, Vellon L, Vazquez-Martin A. Metformin and the ATM DNA damage response (DDR): Accelerating the onset of stress-induced senescence to boost protection against cancer Aging (Albany NY). 2011 Nov;3(11):1063-77. PMID: 22170748
